Question: Kifang Industries Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kifang Industries Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Keyboard & Mouse

- Focus on Research, Development, Production, and Marketing of COMPUTER PERIPHERALS

- Professional engineer team, high-quality products, and on-time delivery

- Private tooling to ensure unique and different products in the market
Summary_cn:
Kifang工业有限公司

- 键盘和鼠标

- 专注于计算机外设的研发、生产和营销

- 专业工程师团队，高质量产品和准时交付

- 私人模具确保市场上的独特和不同产品
